txt.en: A great battle took place upon the face of Cloudyhead, a battle between a Balrog and another mighty Power. The Balrog's demise broke the mountainside here.
These are the remains of the mighty fire demon who had hidden itself in Moria in the days of yore.
You have discovered the Door to the Clouds
You have discovered the Broken Cleft
You have discovered the remains of Durin's Bane
This gateway opens up onto the face of Zirakzigil, the mighty Silvertine.
